title: Being ejected from champ select.
body:
This has happened many times to me now.
I'll be sitting in champ select(Already clicked on a champ) then the game ejects me from the champ select and gives me a message "A game has been found" or something along thoughs lines and regardless of what I click I get black screen and am forced to close client leving me to wait 5 minutes for "dodging queue"

TL:DR rito plz

replies.body: So, after the initial "A match has been found!" and you go in and select a champion, it goes back to "A match has been found!" and not "You have failed to select a champion"?
